languages.text: "Моя победа была предначертана, ибо я бился в большинстве. Вас — всего горстка глупцов, чтящих божество усопшее и ложное. Со мной же Великие Четверо. Да порадует их кровь, пролитая из вен ложноверцев!"

"My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"
languages.original_text: "Моя победа была предначертана, ибо я бился в большинстве. Вас — всего горстка глупцов, чтящих божество усопшее и ложное. Со мной же Великие Четверо. Да порадует их кровь, пролитая из вен ложноверцев!"

traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: “我的胜利早已注定，因为你们寡不敌众。你们不过是一群愚昧无知的蠢货，崇拜着早已逝去的谬论。至于我，伟大的混沌四神都在我身边，愿他们在异教徒的鲜血中狂欢不止！”
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"

traits.locale_text: “我的胜利早已注定，因为你们寡不敌众。你们不过是一群愚昧无知的蠢货，崇拜着早已逝去的谬论。至于我，伟大的混沌四神都在我身边，愿他们在异教徒的鲜血中狂欢不止！”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: « Ma victoire était écrite, car vous étiez en infériorité numérique. Vous n'êtes qu'une bande d'imbéciles vénérant un mensonge qui n'existe plus, alors que je peux compter sur le soutien des Quatre Grands. Puissent-ils se réjouir de voir tout ce sang s'écouler des veines des païens ! »
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"

traits.locale_text: « Ma victoire était écrite, car vous étiez en infériorité numérique. Vous n'êtes qu'une bande d'imbéciles vénérant un mensonge qui n'existe plus, alors que je peux compter sur le soutien des Quatre Grands. Puissent-ils se réjouir de voir tout ce sang s'écouler des veines des païens ! »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「お前たちは死んだ偽りを崇拝する一握りの愚か者ゆえ、俺の勝利は運命づけられていた。俺には偉大なる四使者がついている。異教徒の血管からこぼれる血で彼らを喜ばせよう！」
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちは死んだ偽りを崇拝する一握りの愚か者ゆえ、俺の勝利は運命づけられていた。俺には偉大なる四使者がついている。異教徒の血管からこぼれる血で彼らを喜ばせよう！」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «Mi victoria estaba predestinada gracias a la superioridad numérica. Sois un puñado de ilusos que adoran a una mentira muerta. Yo tengo el poder de los Cuatro de mi lado. ¡Que se regocijen con la sangre de las venas de los herejes!».
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi victoria estaba predestinada gracias a la superioridad numérica. Sois un puñado de ilusos que adoran a una mentira muerta. Yo tengo el poder de los Cuatro de mi lado. ¡Que se regocijen con la sangre de las venas de los herejes!».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Mein Sieg war vorherbestimmt, denn Ihr wart in der Unterzahl. Ihr seid eine Handvoll Narren, die eine tote Lüge verehren. Ich habe die Großen Vier auf meiner Seite. Mögen sie sich in dem Blut baden, das aus den Adern der Heiden strömt!"
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Sieg war vorherbestimmt, denn Ihr wart in der Unterzahl. Ihr seid eine Handvoll Narren, die eine tote Lüge verehren. Ich habe die Großen Vier auf meiner Seite. Mögen sie sich in dem Blatt baden, das aus den Adern der Heiden strömt!"
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Sayıca az oluşunuz, evvelinden zaferimi kesinleştirdi. Ölü safsatanın tekine tapınan bir avuç ahmaktan başka bir şey değilsiniz. Büyük Dörtlü benim yanımda. Kâfirlerin damarlarından dökülen kanla beslensinler!"
languages.original_text: "My victory was predestined, for you were outnumbered. You are a handful of fools who worship a dead fallacy. I have the Great Four on my side. May they revel in the blood that spills from the veins of heathens!"
